name: Fall of the stick knights
description:
Fall of the Stick Knights is the first game I made. FOSK is a local multiplayer game to play with friends. The game is based on physics-controlled characters. In FOSK, you can play with 2 to 4 players at once.

Features in the game:
-Character editor.
-Over 40 different weapons.
-Over 70 different maps.
-PVP.
-Fun to use hook.
- a lot of small mechanics.

Possible future game features:
-Lots of fun.
-Singleplayer story mode.
-Numerous modifiers and the ability to change game rules. (Some are already in the game.)
-LAN multiplayer.
-Map editor.
-Ability to make your own skins.
